entry.title: Forcenet: an experimental network with a new header format
entry.summary: The email thread discusses the improvements made in forcenet, which is a second version of experimental features with a new header format. Suggestions include minimizing header size, having one merkle tree for transactions, not duplicating nBits, avoiding variable-length header fields, and leaving the transaction merkle root of the old-style header as the hash of the new header. Other improvements include anti-tx-replay, block sighashlimit, a new way to define tx weight, smooth halving, a new coinbase tx format, and a Merkle sum tree. The email also provides codes and instructions for joining and mining on forcenet.
